archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection includes three certificates awarded to A. F. Price for "distinguished" work in his examinations at Virginia Agricultural and Mechanical College.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from A. E. F. Price Certificates must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: A. E. F. Price Certificates, Ms2011-031, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The A. E. F. Price Certificates were donated to Special Collections in 2010.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the A. E. F. Price Certificates were completed in March 2011.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: A. E. F. Price graduated from Virginia Agricultural and Mechanical College in 1886. Originally from Blacksburg, Virginia, he was a teacher and farmer in Montgomery County. He passed away August 20, 1893.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The collection contains three awards given to Price for "having been distinguished by attaining to an average of three-fourths in all his Examinations" over the course of three consecutive school years (1882-1885). All three certificates are signed by Thomas Nelson Conrad, president of VAMC from 1880 to 1886.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The three certificates are arranged in chronological order.
